getRangeForBin

public double[] getRangeForBin(int binIndex)
Returns the range for the bin at the specified index.

Parameters:
binIndex - the index of the bin.
Returns:
a double array of length 2 where [0] is the lower bound for the range and [1] is the upper bound for the range.
